When I use the junit-addons to build the suite I am not able to run 
it from the command line,though I am able 
to run it successfully from eclipse.( in other words no tests are 
returned back to TestRunner even if I have a static suite method)

Instead if I use manual method to add the tests to suite (as below). 
I am able to run it from comman line.
suite.addTestSuite
(com.rivermine.useradmin.service.test.SecurityPolicyHelperTest.class);

Any ideas why tests are returned when manually added and not returned 
when junit-addons SuiteBuilder is used?

Details below:


I use junit-addons to automatically build the testcases from the 
packages as shown below

package com.technet.useradmin.test;

import junit.framework.Test;
import junitx.util.DirectorySuiteBuilder;
import junitx.util.SimpleTestFilter;

/**
 *
 * This is for testing the test classes under the package 
com.technet.useradmin
 */
public class UserAdminSuite {
	
	public static Test suite() throws Exception {
        DirectorySuiteBuilder builder = new DirectorySuiteBuilder();
        builder.setFilter(new SimpleTestFilter() {
            public boolean include(Class clazz) {
                return super.include(clazz) &&
                        getPackageName(clazz).startsWith
("com.technet.useradmin"); 
            }
        });
        return builder.suite("build/classes");
    }

}


When I try to run this from the command line using the following 
command line 



set JAVA_HOME=C:\software\j2sdk1.4.2_06
set MAIN_HOME=C:\MainBranch
set LIB=%MAIN_HOME%\lib
set CLASSPATH=%MAIN_HOME%/build/classes;%LIB%/classes12.jar;%
LIB%/junit.jar;%LIB%/log4j-1.2.8.jar;%LIB%/servlet-api.jar;%
LIB%/poi20.jar;%LIB%/junit-addons-1.4.jar
%JAVA_HOME%/bin/java -Xmx256m -Xms256m -D-prop=C:\grapewine\dev-
grapewine\BMSHome\standalone\conf\oracle.properties 
junit.textui.TestRunner com.technet.useradmin.test.UserAdminSuite




The suite doesnt seem to return any tests to the TestRunner . I get 
the following 


C:\scripts>StringUtil.bat

C:\scripts>set JAVA_HOME=C:\software\j2sdk1.4.2_06

C:\scripts>set MAIN_HOME=C:\MainBranch

C:\scripts>set LIB=C:\MainBranch\lib

C:\scripts>set 
CLASSPATH=C:\MainBranch/build/classes;C:\MainBranch\lib/classes12.jar;
C:\MainBranch\lib/junit.jar;C:\MainBranch\lib
/log4j-1.2.8.jar;C:\MainBranch\lib/servlet-
api.jar;C:\MainBranch\lib/poi20.jar;C:\MainBranch\lib/junit-addons-
1.4.jar

C:\scripts>C:\software\j2sdk1.4.2_06/bin/java -Xmx256m -Xms256m -D-
prop=C:\grapewine\dev-grapewine\BMSHome\standalone\conf\oracl
e.properties junit.textui.TestRunner 
com.technet.useradmin.test.UserAdminSuite
